Es un juego simple de entender  te divierte ve los diferentes tipos de asesinos , habilidades y objetos diferentes que puedes usar.

Game is quite enjoyable, although it has become a somewhat competitive party game. The game is balanced around being fun over being competitive however, and this will come up mostly if you are very good. Besides the balance the game is very fun. The biggest downside is that the playerbase is generally very entitled and toxic. If you are willing to accept or ignore the players, the game itself is a lot of fun.

Shit game but I can't stop playing it.

For real though, how can this be almost be 5 years old and have as many bugs, balance problems, and connection issues as it does?

My opinion still stands, but now this game is even fucking worse because they removed set glitching (while fixing no actual major bugs the game has) AND they stole cosmetics out of my inventory, strictly because I refused to buy the whole set. Scummy fuck of a company, they do not care about their players and they just keep doing disappointment after disappointment. Cannot believe how inept they are while squeezing as much money out of each player as they can without a care about the consumer. Shit tier company, shit tier, still broken game.

Oh, and also killer mains have some kind of mental disability that causes them to go on massive power trips, making them think that the game is horribly survivor sided when it isn't. If you disagree with that statement, congratulations, you're part of the problem, and you should see a therapist; you clearly have severe issues with your brain that you need to get checked out.
Game is fucking broken don't waste your money

No pienso volver a jugar hasta que no se saque el MMR, tener que jugar tryhards todas las p.u.t.a.s partidas, encontrar siempre a los mismos 3 asesinos, con las mismas perks y viceversa en el caso de los survis es A B U R R I D O.

Edit: ahora se transformo en un juego para pelotudos fanaticos del kpop, cada vez mas nefasto este juego de mierda. 


El juego con los desarrolladores mas inutiles, cada parche lo rompen mas y mas y lo unico bueno que tenia, que eran los eventos, los dejaron de hacer porque ni eso pueden hacer sin cagarla. Queres tilteos asegurados? Compralo. Queres pasarla bien? Compra otra cosa.

I think this is a great game, a little grindy, and a bit of content is locked behind paywalls, but I think this is a great game. For me, I've been watching this game for years and years, but never had a PC that could run anything until recently. I love the mindgames and teamwork, and juking a killer in a bush as he scours the area looking for you is a feeling rare to find in other games.

Do not get this game if you have poor internet. I have done hours of troubleshooting, but I have not been able to fix my internet, and due to this, I frequently get downed in the simplest chases and the easiest loops because my character stops running while my internet recovers from it's 2 second long micro-seizure.

Other than that, do watch this game on youtube to see if you might enjoy it, but reaching the entirety of the content you see streamers and youtubers enjoy will require dedication or deep pockets.

Love this game. Hella addictive. I pretty much main Survivor. The Adrenaline rush from being chased + outplays. Lots of perks/variety to do. I get either laughs or pain every game. I'm a Meghead at heart, but Feng Min is the main, because she has the best skins!

Now, I've been on both sides at rank 1 killer and survivor....
Killer is definitely more stressful and harder to play, because there is so much you have to juggle such as hooking survivors, patrolling generators, mind games during chases, map awareness, understanding your killers kit and add-ons, vsing 4 other great players, etc.. (Legion and Cannibal can make it easy to hit rank 1 for beginners). Survivors can do alright most of the time. (yes, even if you solo not every game is perfect, but you will find your luck) I also, personally think Purple ranks are more toxic compared to Red ranks..

Cons of the game would be (but not limited to) :
long queue times, toxic community such as swf sweaty tryhards in post game chat, facecamping killers (those who tunnel idrc about), basement bubbas (so many teammates will throw the game trying to save someone..)

nevertheless,
I would recommend this game to anyone, the more I play the more stuff I learn. You can't escape from it! Endless entertainment and fun!!

Started out disliking this game (even though I bought it), but I wound up enjoying it, lol. 
As long as you have friends who want to play this game, it's definitely worthwhile.
I would recommend this game for everyone. Also please add more costumes pleaseeeeeeeeee?!!! Thanks. Much love for the game, heart heart.

Janky connections, devs "fix" issues by adding killers/survivors that you can either pay for or grinding for 31 days (play time) to get perks for gameplay problems. Also you'll randomly get a error stating you changed the game files whether you did or not and when you get that error, oh boy prepare to reinstall your game.

Love this game.
Love playing the killer, need to get better with the other characters.
this game cool no cap and if u say its bad ur bad get good lol :)
this game makes me want to die

I try to play this game to have fun, but the game isn't made to have fun.

Regardless of what side you play, you'll have to deal with perks that ruin the core gameplay, bad matchmaking, and toxic people. The latter is more prevalent when you play killer, hence no one wants to play killer and thus killer queues are instant whilst survivor ones takes several minutes on average. You cannot report a lot of recurring actions that ruin gameplay, and when you can report you'll run into the incredibly troublesome report system (really, you want me to find their steamID64? And when they hack you want video evidence?).

The developers do not care about fun. They push broken DLC, they ignore test server feedback, they introduce and do not fix perks that ruin gameplay. All those things people do over and over that ruin games? The devs promote it, tell you to go play other games, introduce killers that excel at those gameplay styles.

Man, I'm just starting to learn killer. I get put up against people 10 ranks higher than me who abuse exploits so I cant hit them, hit me with DS, tbag me at every opportunity, don't leave the match even when the gate is open and ive clearly given up, and laugh at me in end-game chat.

I just want to have fun.
its super good and i would 100% recomend it.
i love this game so much i bought it for ps4 and pc

You need to fix the fucking hit-boxes in this game. How are you going to have a comp rank and have a broken system. The fact that this game didn't dive into the ground and fade to existence blows my mind. Such an incompetent team that makes this shit pile. So many times do you witness where a killer swings 2 feet behind you and still manages to hit you. I have seen people get hit through walls by how shite this games hit reg works. Do yourself a favor, stay far away from this game as it won't be playable for a very long time.

Is it perfect? No. Is it fun? FUCK yea 

This game isn't going to be for everyone. Odds are you ARE going to be helpless as a suvivor. That's the point. Survivors are suppose to be helpless against a Killer. As a suvivor you don't play to win games, you play to survive them. And as a Killer you play to do one thing and only one thing, kill. If you don't like being helpless against an unstopable Killer IF he finds you, then odds are you aren't going to like Dead by Daylight. But if you are smart. Then either the Survivors or Killer can turn the odds in their favor to make fools out of the other.
(Rank 1 killer at 250 hours)

This game is definitely a lot of fun. My only issue is that it takes its rank system VERY seriously so you cannot queue into a game with a party of survivors and a killer (like you can in games like Depth.) That being said - it can still be a lot of fun until you plateau skill-wise via rank system and encounter a lot of toxic situations. What would make this game so much better is having modes dedicated to casual, unranked and ranked. But for that to be possible, there would need to be a player base and this one is fairly limited. You will encounter irregular queue times depending on your time zone unfortunately. Still a fun game to come back to per reset period every once in a while.

e os killers s√£o irritantes dependendo do rank deles e do seu.

alem do mais, voc√™ pode pegar personagens usando irridescent shards (cristal roxo)
s√≥ que voc√™ vai acabar gastando em skin e no santu√°rio de perk. (que nem eu)

agora uma coisa que me deixa muito chateado s√£o os devs. eles n√£o fazem quase nada pela comunidade. o jogo √© lindo daora e mt divertido. mas quando tem uma falha a BHVR (behaviour) n faz porra nenhuma por n√≥s.

oque eu diria √© pra voc√™ comprar o jogo numa promo√ß√£o, n√£o tente reembolsalo de prima. (s√≥ se seu pc n rodar)
